name: GEORGIA

description.short: Minimalist modern ballgown with asymmetric pleated neckline and functional pocket.
description.full:
Details

  • Style: Minimalist Modern Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Matte Satin
  • Color: Sophisticated Ivory
  • Design: Clean and architectural
  • Size: Custom size

Features

  • Unique asymmetric pleated neckline that creates a contemporary, high-fashion look.
  • Structured corset bodice for a tailored and secure fit.
  • Full, box-pleated ballgown skirt with a smooth, matte finish.
  • Functional single pocket—a chic and practical detail for the modern bride.
  • Adjustable back to ensure the perfect fit for custom measurements.

Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱15,500
  • Onhand: Sold
  • Made to Order: Available
  • Made to Rent: Available

priceMessage: Message us on Facebook for the rental price or to start your custom order!
